title: I Pitches
stimulusHtml:
16 points

Pitches (16 points)

  1. Award 1 point for each correctly notated pitch. Do not consider duration. (An accidental placed after the note head is not considered correct notation.)

  2. Award full credit for octave transpositions of the correct bass pitch. (Octave transpositions of soprano pitches are not allowed.)

  3. No enharmonic equivalents are allowed.

title: II Chord Symbols
stimulusHtml:
Chord Symbols (8 points)

  1. Award 1 point for each chord symbol correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals.

  2. Award ½ point for each correct Roman numeral that has incorrect or missing Arabic numerals.

  3. Accept the correct Roman numeral regardless of its case.
descriptions:

title: III Rounding Fractional Scores
stimulusHtml:
III. Rounding Fractional Scores

Half-point totals round up with one exception: A total score of 23½ rounds down to 23.
descriptions:
III. Rounding Fractional Scores

Half-point totals round up with one exception: A total score of 23½ rounds down to 23.

III. Rounding Fractional Scores

Half-point totals round up with one exception: A total score of 23½ rounds down to 23.

title: IV Special Scoring Issues
stimulusHtml:
IV. Special Scoring Issues

0 This score is used for a response that represents an unsuccessful attempt to answer the question or a response that is off-topic or irrelevant.
descriptions:
